Applicant : Dyorich, Matthew
School (district) : Thunder Ridge High School (Bonneville School District)
Role(s) : High School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : My summer jobs include: U-Haul transfer driver, curriculum writing at District and State levels, Migrant Education and Summer School, History Fellowships, using my Spanish and education experiences to work for a temporary employment agency and hiring hundreds of people for employment. I am a people person through and through and can work with almost anyone.

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am in my 29th year of teaching and I am always actively looking for opportunities to learn, grow and improve my teaching and have new experiences. My summers have been filled with activities like writing curriculum for the State Dept. of ED Social Studies Department, History Fellowships, working at temp employee businesses, an externship last year and a variety of other experiences that I feel help me improve as an educator.
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Remote
	* Hybrid
	* In-Person

My summers have been filled with activities like writing curriculum for the State Dept. of ED Social Studies Department, History Fellowships, working at temp employee businesses, an externship last year and a variety of other experiences that I feel help me improve as an educator.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
